title: Darius W is not applying the atk speed slow
body:
His W is not applying the atk speed slow. This is a SERIOUS bug.
Also, his passive bleeding sometimes don't do the full damage. Please, he is unplayable this way.

I just lost hard to a irelia top lane, and was asking myself " seems like my W is not reducing her atk speed "
Than I tested it on a custom game, and I used my W several times. In none of them it reduced the target atk speed.

Reposting it on report a bug section, so rioters don't delete it

replies.body: It honestly does not even need to. Its just there as a nice AA reset and slow. I never think "I'm going to use this on their carry to reduce their attack speed!". I think "I'm going to use this on their carry to get another stack so I can ulti them for more damage"

> [{quoted}](name=360D3GR3SS,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-07T18:50:23.959+0000)
>
> It honestly does not even need to. Its just there as a nice AA reset and slow. I never think "I'm going to use this on their carry to reduce their attack speed!". I think "I'm going to use this on their carry to get another stack so I can ulti them for more damage"

It's pretty friggin' important if you're laning against Tryndamere, whose level 2 all in is actually stronger than Darius' already, and outscales him dramatically.

Just tested this and yeah, the attack speed slow doesn't occur. Rito pls fix.

Also fix the bleed bug.

> [{quoted}](name=360D3GR3SS,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-07T18:50:23.959+0000)
>
> It honestly does not even need to. Its just there as a nice AA reset and slow. I never think "I'm going to use this on their carry to reduce their attack speed!". I think "I'm going to use this on their carry to get another stack so I can ulti them for more damage"

As a Darius main, if you remove his attack speed debuff I better get some compensation up in this *****.

> [{quoted}](name=Shtrius,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-06-07T23:31:25.305+0000)
>
> As a Darius main, if you remove his attack speed debuff I better get some compensation up in this *****.

A huge one. Darius atk speed reduction is what makes him actually strong against physical damage dealers. People think it is his damage and stuff, but he is able to deny your AA damage with his atk speed slow, which makes him strong 1v1 against them.
This bug is making my life a nightmare. Darius can't win against irelia, riven top anymore because of this. Even though riven is pretty annoying even with the atk speed reduction

> [{quoted}](name=DropFill,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2015-06-07T23:38:53.309+0000)
>
> A huge one. Darius atk speed reduction is what makes him actually strong against physical damage dealers. People think it is his damage and stuff, but he is able to deny your AA damage with his atk speed slow, which makes him strong 1v1 against them.
> This bug is making my life a nightmare. Darius can't win against irelia, riven top anymore because of this. Even though riven is pretty annoying even with the atk speed reduction

TBH the atk speed reduction does nothing to riven because she has 0.01 delay between her autoattacks and her Qs. It does help IF she doesnt use her q.

> [{quoted}](name=360D3GR3SS,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-07T18:50:23.959+0000)
>
> It honestly does not even need to. Its just there as a nice AA reset and slow. I never think "I'm going to use this on their carry to reduce their attack speed!". I think "I'm going to use this on their carry to get another stack so I can ulti them for more damage"

Only you.
When I am laning, it is very important to reduce their atk speed, so they can't outduel me in fast trades. But this is not happening anymore. It is a bug.
It is like saying that riven W no longer stunning is fine because you just want a stack of your passive.
Oh man...I was so confused why the enemy Rek'Sai got everything off so quick
I just hate how the passive doesnt do full damage. That along with a doran shield makes darius passive feel almost worthless in lane

> [{quoted}](name=Spicy Rice,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-07T19:40:00.436+0000)
>
> I just hate how the passive doesnt do full damage. That along with a doran shield makes darius passive feel almost worthless in lane

Exactly. His passive already doesn't do much damage at all , except with five stacks, but it doesn't do full damage.
Riot needs to fix this.

What's this talk about "Darius' passive bleeding sometimes doesn't do the full damage"? Does it do less damage than it should? Does it not last as LONG as it should? Have you done any investigating into the "sometimes" part of it, i.e. do you have any clues as to why it happens sometimes but not other times?

> [{quoted}](name=Vaati006,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-06-08T19:32:16.512+0000)
>
> What's this talk about "Darius' passive bleeding sometimes doesn't do the full damage"? Does it do less damage than it should? Does it not last as LONG as it should? Have you done any investigating into the "sometimes" part of it, i.e. do you have any clues as to why it happens sometimes but not other times?

Sometimes, the last tick doesn't go off

> [{quoted}](name=Vaati006,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-06-08T19:32:16.512+0000)
>
> What's this talk about "Darius' passive bleeding sometimes doesn't do the full damage"? Does it do less damage than it should? Does it not last as LONG as it should? Have you done any investigating into the "sometimes" part of it, i.e. do you have any clues as to why it happens sometimes but not other times?

It's almost always missing a tick of bleed iirc.

When it isn't missing a tick of bleed, it instead does 2 ticks of damage at the same time right at the end, instead of properly waiting for the last tick (but this happens far less often than just entirely losing the damage). I do not know what causes this second situation, somebody else might however.

Wow I just tested this in a custom.

His W does in fact not reduce attack speed at ranks 1 and 2.

We didn't test any further, so I could be for all ranks.

Edit: Riot needs to fix Darius. His E is bugged, his Bleed is bugged, and his W is bugged as well. 40% attack speed not proccing? No wonder darius has been in the shitter for so long!
Lane Cancer, this happened prob tdoday or yesterday. Never had this problem. i can confirm
Can confirm. Fix this now.

> [{quoted}](name=Shtrius,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-07T23:33:24.814+0000)
>
> Can confirm. Fix this now.

I thought his W was unable to atk speed slow minions, that's why it was not reducing it.
But I tested on champions and seriously, this bug really lowers darius early game power by a lot.

> [{quoted}](name=DropFill,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-07T23:39:57.608+0000)
>
> I thought his W was unable to atk speed slow minions, that's why it was not reducing it.
> But I tested on champions and seriously, this bug really lowers darius early game power by a lot.

Darius's whole game* that shit is really crucial. It does apply on minions jungles except drag and baron.

Can we please fix Darius?
I mean, come the hell on. He is so bugged. 3/5 skills dont work as intended.

Huh....I just thought it slow movement and had a reduce cooldown based on his passive. 

Mind you I don't own him but I have played against him a lot and I never knew this. 




.....Still hate fighting him though....but that is my opinion and I can understand you wanting him bug free. Bumping for a Red to see.
mh, and i wondered why he felt weaker than he should in duels...considering  shuting down melees is pretty much the only reason to pick him this is really a serious bug.

Logged in just to upvote this. Darius has needed the passive glitch fixed for quite some time now, and now this, which is even a bigger problem.

I think Riot needs to hire more developers. Honestly. The rate of problems rising is much higher than those being fixed right now.

Good to see a fix for one problem is in the PBE. I'm assuming the bleed problem hasn't been changed?

Can a Rioter inform us if this has been acknowledged and is in the works with the attack speed reduction fix?
EDIT!! DARIUS CAN REDUCE ATTACK SPEED ON PBE!!! NOT ON LIVE!!

We'll get riot's attention someday

Someday.....

> [{quoted}](name=Lane Cancer,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-06-09T00:12:12.363+0000)
>
> We'll get riot's attention someday
> 
> Someday.....

I hope they see this. Darius is already pretty bad, he doesn't need bugs too to make him even worse
another bug is his ult not reseting properly at rank 3

> [{quoted}](name=thebloody7,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NkfBAj4c,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-06-09T00:21:30.165+0000)
>
> another bug is his ult not reseting properly at rank 3

I have never seen this one though
Needs to be fixed pronto. Upvoting for great justice.

Darius is terreble   after last patch  few times   darius not respond to attak just walk    i need  cast  Q to reset him   and after that  back to normal !!  and  many times  bleeding not working  ! darius looks like one huge bug now !!
